kb3.name: kb3_corps
kb3.structure: CREATE TABLE `kb3_corps` ( `crp_id` int(11) NOT NULL auto_increment, `crp_name` char(64) NOT NULL default '', `crp_all_id` int(11) NOT NULL default '0', `crp_external_id` int(11) unsigned default NULL, `crp_updated` datetime default NULL, PRIMARY KEY (`crp_id`), UNIQUE KEY `crp_name` (`crp_name`), UNIQUE KEY `crp_external_id` (`crp_external_id`) ) Engine=MyISAM DEFAULT CHARSET=utf8 COLLATE utf8_general_ci;
